page.title: 16HOUSING DEVELOPMENT
page.content: {HOUSING DEVELOPMENT-S.E.ENGLAND Hartlip is a beautiful village in the heart of Kent.Here lives the head of a large building company.He was interviewed and asked to comment on house building today.He said thet there is a trend away from building big estates.New houses today fall into 3 groups.Firstly starter homes for young people qualifying for 100% mortgages.These homes are fully fitted & there are few extras to find. Secondly homes for retired people with wardens nearby.Previosly homes for the elderly were council owned.Thirdly larger houses with luxury facilities.These may be copies of period houses. Planning restictions are now strict. Tax has to be added to extra building work.However many extend rather than have the expense of moving.
